name: News Ticker
author: Fazilatunnesa

sections.description: This plugin will enable news ticker in your wordpress theme. You can embed news ticker via shortcode in everywhere you want, even in theme files.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcode in page, post or in widgets.
  4. If you want news ticker in your theme php, Place <?php echo do_shortcode('YOUR_SHORTCODE'); ?> in your templates

Shortcodes

General Ticker

[tickr_list id="1"]

Ticker form category

[tickr_list id="2" category="1"]

Speed change

[tickr_list id="3" speed="1000"]

TypeSpeed Change

[tickr_list id="4" typespeed="100"]

Color variation

[tickr_list id="5" color="red"]

Text change!

[tickr_list id="6" text="Breaking News!"]
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?

You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different way. Please see on installation tab.

Why this plugin doesn’t support link in ticker?

If you need link support in ticker, you have to purchase premium version. Premium version is coming soon. Please wait for that.

short_description: News Ticker is an awesome, super lightweight plugin for your wordpress website.
description: This plugin will enable news ticker in your wordpress theme. You can embed news ticker via shortcode in everywhere you want, even in theme files.
